channel.title: Client won't connect to server
channel.description:
Alright, I know I'm going to get called noob and all that other stuff, but honestly I have followed every single tut there is, opened port forwarding using both my router and utorrent, but still my client doesn't connect to my server. yes I have changed the ip to my own, and even tried changing it to that of the no-ip. Basically I'm stuck, can anyone help?
UPDATE:
I'm sure I've portforwarded correctly and even turned my firewall off for a bit. I keep getting the J5connect error, even though my server is running. I'm using eclipse 639 client
